content: सवनं [सु सू वा --ल्युट्] {@--1@} Extracting the Soma juice or drinking it. {@--2@} A sacrifice; अथ तं सवनाय दीक्षितः <ls>R. 8. 75</ls>; <ls>Ś. 3. 27.</ls> {@--3@} A libation, sacrificial libation. {@--4@} Bathing, purificatory ablution. {@--5@} Generation, bearing or bringing forth children.
